text: Money is always there but the pockets change it is not in the same pockets after a change, and that is all there is to say about money.
author: Gertrude Stein

text: You have to go broke three times to learn how to make a living.
author: Casey Stengel

text: Everyone needs a certain amount of money. Beyond that, we pursue money because we know how to obtain it. We don't necessarily know how to obtain happiness.
author: Gregg Easterbrook

text: If I have enough money to eat I'm good.
author: Shia LaBeouf

text: The importance of money flows from it being a link between the present and the future.
author: John Maynard Keynes
